wikipedia_page.main: Alasdair George Hay,  (born 24 December 1961) is a British firefighter. He was the first Chief Fire Officer of the Scottish Fire and Rescue Service.

response: On 16 August 2012, the Scottish Government confirmed the first chief fire officer of the new service would be Alasdair Hay, then acting chief fire officer of Tayside Fire and Rescue Service, following an open recruitment exercise.
* Alasdair Hay, QFSM – For services to the Scottish Fire and Rescue Service.
